name: Yeong Hoon Park
description: Hi, I'm a Master's student studying computer science at University of Minnesota, Twin Cities. As a researcher, I study and develop novel techniques for helping programming education and collaborative learning on MOOCs. Most of my academic work are done in collaboration with great people at GroupLens Research and KAIST U&I Lab.
Previously, I worked as a software engineer at Kakao and Lotiple, and co-founded Seoul Bus[1].
